Farkas provided financial support to Trump through an intermediary

analysis.summary: Jonathan Farkas emails Jeffrey Epstein discussing financial market outlook following Trump's election victory and mentions having given money to Trump through an intermediary named Woody, while also noting Epstein's upcoming birthday.
